front.title: Definition of IANA Registry for Timezone Names

abstract.t: VCards need a stable, well defined list of timezone names, so thatusers can create VCards that refer to timezones. There is no commonlist of such names, and other standards need timezone names also.This document creates an IANA registry of timezone names, andinitially populates the list.Initial versiono Define timezone registry.o Defer initial population with Olsen database until we like thebasic document.
